SYSTEM: 3._Metodolog%C3%ADa-1-scenarios%2Bspec-v1%28asun%29.pdf: Página 72
© A. Gómez Pérez, M.C. Suárez-Figueroa, B. Villazón
77
Ontological Engineering
Watson NeOn Toolkit plugin
• While building an 
ontology with the Neon 
toolkit
• Find descriptions of 
existing entities in Web 
ontologies
• Integrate these 
descriptions into the 
edited ontology
• Thus allowing knowledge 
reuse at the scale of the 
Semantic Web
• In one simple, integrated, 
and interactive tool
speaker: SYSTEM
